(Simplified: 钣)
Chinese Definition:
①金屬板：鈑梁(用鋼板和型鋼做成工字形截面和箱形截面的梁。用於橋樑、大型廠房等各種工程結構中)。鋁鈑。鉛鈑。鋼鈑。

鈑字的基本解释

bǎn

鈑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǎn］
［《廣韻》布綰切，上潸，幫。］
“钣1”的繁体字。
饼状金银块。亦指板块状金属。

鈑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鈑； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1298第19
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?補綰切，音版。鉼金曰鈑。【爾雅·釋器】鉼金謂之鈑。【釋文】鈑，音版。【周禮·秋官·職金】祭五帝供金鈑。【賀知章詩】鈑鏤銀盤薦蛤蜊。　又【字彙補】與版同。【莊子·徐無鬼】金鈑六弢。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　ban; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: Page 1298 Page 19
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Make up and cut, sound version. The metal is called sheet. [Erya·Release Device] Metal is called sheet metal. [Explanation] Sheet, sound version. 【Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Professional gold】Memorial to the five emperors to provide metal sheets. 【He Zhizhang Poetry】Clams on a silver plate and plate.　[Word Supplement] Same as the version. 【Zhuangzi·Xu Wugui】The Six Secret Teachings of Jinban.
